decoworld.model.world.entities.combat

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
          • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCollision, HasCombat, HasHealth, Projectile, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>

    public class Arrow
extends CombatEntity
implements Projectile, HasPhysicsBox
    Arrow class used to demonstrate projectile-based combat.
